front.title: MPLS Label Stack Encapsulation in IP

abstract.t: Several useful applications of MPLS tunnels based on LSPs withsecond level labels between non adjacent LSRs have beenidentified: IP-VPNs and VoIP over MPLS are just two examples. Thistunnelling technique can easily be extended to non-MPLS corenetworks.This Internet-Draft explains the motivation for encapsulating MPLSmessages in IP and provides the protocol specification of theencapsulation.
